com.conichi.sdk.beaconkit.scanner.internal

Class CNIDefaultScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.conichi.sdk.beaconkit.scanner.internal.CNIDefaultScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CNIRangingController, CNIScanController, CNIScanner

    public class CNIDefaultScanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements CNIScanner, CNIRangingController
    CNIScanner implementation which uses CNIAltBeaconWrapper as a scanning tool and also depends on the Precondition object
